levels.description:
The next heal grants all targets a <$ba.barrier>Barrier</> that lasts for <@ba.vup>{duration}</> seconds
The barrier can absorb <@ba.vup>Arts damage</> equal to <@ba.vup>{atk_scale:0%}</> of Nightingale's ATK and increases the target's RES by <@ba.vup>+{magic_resistance}</>; <@ba.rem>Can store {ct} charge(s)</>
